segments.text: Good morning , May . Good girl , you are reading English books again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . There is no reason to miss so beautiful a morning . Is that a new bird ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , my daughter bought it yesterday . We call her Lulu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks so cute . Is it a parrot ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Just look at her colorful feathers . What else can it be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . It's interesting that there is also a parrot in my English book . His mane is Polly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you can teach Lulu some English words .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lulu . Lulu . Say hello . hello . Oh , she is so smart . Good bird .
segments.speaker: S2
